General.Name: Nusantara Almazia
General.Description: PT Nusantara Almazia Tbk engages in the property development business in Indonesia. It develops housings, apartments, offices, hospitals, hotels, and schools. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Karawang, Indonesia.
General.Address: Kantor Pemasaran CKM City, Karawang, Indonesia, 41371
